COMMENT_TX: $Rondell White hurt hamstring running out grounder
$infield shifted to right for Giambi throughout game
$Ben Weber left with sprained finger after being struck by ball
$Troy Glaus covered 2B on 'Giambi shift'; Benjie Molina threw to 2B on ball 4; when ball was missed and no one was covering 3B, Derek Jeter advanced; Official ruling 'fielder's choice'
